name: Eldritch Kindergarten
description:
You finally managed to successfully complete your first summoning as a disciple of Cthulhu ! However thing didnt really went as planned and you actually sommoned two baby that will ( probably ) not corrupt your entire world.

You are now on a mission to fufill their needs and prevent them from throwing a tantrum and destroy your world. You will go in other dimension to find the toys and food they so desperately need !

Controls :
WASD / Arrow : Movements
Space : Jump
G : Interact / Use combining platform / Pickup Item
Q : Drop item / Empty Inventory

This game was made for the Ludum Dare 50 GameJam.
